GK18bharnatu:4086: noktā yā yā mayā hyatra grāhyāstāstāśca lokataḥ /

GK18bharnatu:4095: dakṣiṇastu samaḥ pādaḥ tryaśraḥ pakṣasthito 'paraḥ // BhN_12.163 //
GK18bharnatu:4097: āvāhane visarge ca tathā nirvarṇaneṣu ca // BhN_12.164 //
GK18bharnatu:4103: samo yatra sthito vāmastryaśraḥ pakṣasthito 'paraḥ // BhN_12.167 //
GK18bharnatu:4109: strīṇāmetat smṛtaṃ sthānaṃ saṃlāpe tu svabhāvaje // BhN_12.170 //
GK18bharnatu:4110: niścaye paritoṣe ca vitarke cintane tathā /
GK18bharnatu:4122: bhagnaṃ ca sthānakaṃ nṛtte cārī cetsamupasthitā /

GK18bharnatu:4125: kṛtvāvahitthaṃ sthānaṃ tu vāmaṃ cādhomukhaṃ karam // BhN_12.178 //
GK18bharnatu:4129: tenaiva samakālaṃ ca latākhyaṃ vāmakaṃ bhujam // BhN_12.180 //
GK18bharnatu:4131: nitambe dakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā hastaṃ codveṣṭya vāmakam // BhN_12.181 //
GK18bharnatu:4132: tato vāmapadaṃ dadyāt latāhastaṃ ca dakṣiṇam /
GK18bharnatu:4135: yo vidhiḥ puruṣāṇāṃ tu raṅgapīṭhaparikrame // BhN_12.183 //
GK18bharnatu:4136: sa eva pramadānāṃ vai kartavyo nāṭyayoktṛbhiḥ /

GK18bharnatu:4141: kṛtvāpaviddhaṃ sthānantu vāmaṃ nyasya kaṭītaṭe // BhN_12.186 //
GK18bharnatu:4143: na niṣaṇṇaṃ na ca stabdhaṃ na cāpi parivāhitam // BhN_12.187 //
GK18bharnatu:4144: kṛtvā gātraṃ tato gacchettenaiveha krameṇa tu /
GK18bharnatu:4147: sthānaṃ kṛtvāvahitthaṃ ca vāmaṃ cādhomukhaṃ bhujam // BhN_12.189 //
GK18bharnatu:4152: strīṇāṃ kāpuruṣāṇāṃ ca tato 'rdhārdhaṃ tu yojayet /
GK18bharnatu:4156: na tasyāḥ sauṣṭhavaṃ kāryaṃ na pramāṇaṃ prayoktṛbhiḥ /

GK18bharnatu:4161: vyājena krīḍayā vāpi tathā bhūyaṃ ca vañcanāt // BhN_12.196 //
GK18bharnatu:4162: strī puṃsaḥ prakṛtiṃ kuryāt strībhāvaṃ puruṣo 'pi ca /
GK18bharnatu:4163: dhairyodāryeṇa sattvena buddhyā tadvacca karmaṇā // BhN_12.197 //
GK18bharnatu:4169: vratasthānāṃ tapaḥsthānāṃ liṅgasthānāṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_12.200 //
GK18bharnatu:4171: uddhatā ye 'ṅgahārāḥ syuḥ yāścāryo maṇḍalāni ca // BhN_12.201 //
GK18bharnatu:4173: tathāsanavidhiḥ kāryo nṛṇāṃ strīṇāṃ viśeṣataḥ // BhN_12.202 //
GK18bharnatu:4181: prasārya bāhū śithilau tathā śropāśrayāśritaḥ // BhN_12.206 //
GK18bharnatu:4185: tathā cotkaṭikaṃ sthānaṃ sphikpārṣṇīnāṃ samāgamaḥ // BhN_12.208 //
GK18bharnatu:4186: pitrye nivāpe japye ca sandhyāsvācamane 'pi ca /
GK18bharnatu:4187: viṣkambhitaṃ punaścaivaṃ jānuṃ bhūmau nipātayet // BhN_12.209 //
GK18bharnatu:4191: śoke cākrandane tīvre mṛtānāṃ caiva darśane // BhN_12.211 //
GK18bharnatu:4192: trāsane ca kusattvānāṃ nīcānāṃ caiva yācane /
GK18bharnatu:4193: homayajñakriyāyāṃ ca preṣyāṇāṃ caiva kārayet // BhN_12.212 //
GK18bharnatu:4198: devānāṃ nṛpatīnāṃ ca dadyāt siṃhāsanaṃ dvijaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4206: bhoginīnāṃ tathā caiva vastraṃ carma kutho 'pi vā /
GK18bharnatu:4209: śeṣāṇāṃ pramadānāṃ tu bhaved bhūmyāsanaṃ dvijāḥ // BhN_12.220 //
GK18bharnatu:4215: home yajñakriyāyāṃ ca pitrye 'rthe ca prayojayet // BhN_12.223 //
GK18bharnatu:4219: atirikte 'tiriktaṃ ca hīne bhūmyāsanaṃ bhavet // BhN_12.225 //
GK18bharnatu:4225: udvāhitaṃ nataṃ caiva śayane karma kīrtyate // BhN_12.228 //
GK18bharnatu:4229: samaṃ nāma prasuptasya sthānakaṃ saṃvidhīyate // BhN_12.230 //
GK18bharnatu:4231: sthānaṃ prasāritaṃ nāma sukhasuptasya kārayet // BhN_12.231 //
GK18bharnatu:4235: udvāhitaṃ tu vijñeyaṃ līlayā veśane prabhoḥ // BhN_12.233 //
GK18bharnatu:4238: gatiprācārastu mayodito 'yaṃ noktaśca yaḥ so 'rthavaśena sādhyaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4239: ataḥ paraṃ raṅgaparikramasya vakṣyāmi kakṣyāṃ pravibhāgayuktām //
GK18bharnatu:4240: iti bharatīye nāṭyaśāstre gatipracāro nāma dvādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GK18bharnatu:4242: ye tu pūrvaṃ mayā proktāstrayo vai nāṭyamaṇḍapāḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4243: teṣāṃ vibhāgaṃ vijñāya tataḥ kakṣyāṃ prayojayet // BhN_13.1 //
GK18bharnatu:4245: tayorbhāṇḍasya vinyāso madhye kāryaḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_13.2 //
GK18bharnatu:4247: parikrameṇa raṅgasya kakṣyā hyanyā vidhīyate // BhN_13.3 //
GK18bharnatu:4254: nagare vā vane vāpi varṣe vā parvate 'pi vā /
GK18bharnatu:4255: yatra vārtā pravarteta tatra kakṣyāṃ pravartayet // BhN_13.7 //
GK18bharnatu:4256: bāhyaṃ vā madhyamaṃ vāpi tathaivābhyantaraṃ punaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4257: dūraṃ vā sannikṛṣṭaṃ vā deśaṃ tu parikalpayet // BhN_13.8 //
GK18bharnatu:4259: paścātpraviṣṭā vijñeyāḥ kakṣyābhāge tu bāhyataḥ // BhN_13.9 //
GK18bharnatu:4262: yato mukhaṃ bhavedbhāṇḍaṃ dvāraṃ nepathyakasya ca /
GK18bharnatu:4263: sā mantavyā tu dik pūrvā nāṭyayoge na nityaśaḥ // BhN_13.11 //
GK18bharnatu:4264: niṣkrāmedyaśca tasmādvai sa tenaiva tathā vrajet /
GK18bharnatu:4265: yatastasya kṛtaṃ tena puruṣeṇa nivedanam // BhN_13.12 //
GK18bharnatu:4267: yataḥ prāptaḥ sa puruṣastena mārgeṇa niṣkramet // BhN_13.13 //
GK18bharnatu:4269: tathaiva praviśet gehamekākī sahito 'pi vā // BhN_13.14 //
GK18bharnatu:4271: parikrameṇa raṅgasya tvanyā kakṣyā vidhīyate // BhN_13.15 //
GK18bharnatu:4273: atha prekṣaṇikāścāpi vijñeyā hyagrato gatau // BhN_13.16 //
GK18bharnatu:4275: madhyā vā sannikṛṣṭā vā teṣāmevaṃ vikalpayet // BhN_13.17 //
GK18bharnatu:4276: nagare vā vane vāpi sāgare parvate 'pi vā /
GK18bharnatu:4277: divyānāṃ gamanaṃ kāryaṃ dvīpe varṣeṣu vā punaḥ // BhN_13.18 //
GK18bharnatu:4281: mānuṣe kāraṇādeṣāṃ yathā bhavati darśanam // BhN_13.20 //
GK18bharnatu:4282: bhārate tvatha haime vā harivarṣa ilāvṛte /

GK18bharnatu:4288: ahnaḥ pramāṇaṃ gatvā tu kāryalābhaṃ vinirdiśed /

GK18bharnatu:4290: kṣaṇo muhūrto yāno vā divaso vāpi nāṭake /

GK18bharnatu:4299: hemakūṭe ca gandharvā vijñeyāḥ sāpsarogaṇāḥ // BhN_13.29 //
GK18bharnatu:4301: mahāmerau trayastriṃśad jñeyā devagaṇā budhaiḥ // BhN_13.30 //

GK18bharnatu:4313: evaṃ kakṣyāvibhāgastu mayā prokto dvijottamāḥ // BhN_13.36 //
GK18bharnatu:4316: āvantī dākṣiṇātyā ca pāñcālī coḍhramāgadhī // BhN_13.37 //
GK18bharnatu:4317: atrāha pravṛttiriti kasmāt ? ucyate pṛthivyāṃ nānādeśaveṣabhāṣācāravārtāḥ prakhyāpayatīti vṛttiḥ |
GK18bharnatu:4323: kintu nānādeśaveṣabhāṣācāro loka iti kṛtvā lokānumatena vṛttisaṃśritasya nāṭyasya vṛttīnāṃ mayā caturvidhatvamabhihitaṃ bhāratī sāttvatī kaiśikyārabhaṭī ceti |

GK18bharnatu:4359: pāñcālyāmoḍhramāgadhyāṃ yojyaṃ dvāraṃ tu dakṣiṇam // BhN_13.53 //

GK18bharnatu:4384: dvārāṇi ṣaṭ caiva bhavanti cāsya raṅgasya digbhāgaviniścitāni |
GK18bharnatu:4385: nāṭyaprayogeṇa khalu praveśe prācyāṃ pratīcyāṃ ca diśi praveśaḥ // BhN_13.66 //
GK18bharnatu:4386: vidhānamutkramya yathā ca raṅge vinā pramāṇādvidiśaḥ prayoge |

GK18bharnatu:4390: dharmī yā dvividhā proktā mayā pūrvaṃ dvijottamāḥ /

GK18bharnatu:4395: yadīdṛśaṃ bhavennāṭyaṃ lokadharmī tu sā smṛtā // BhN_13.71 //

GK18bharnatu:4401: mūrtimat sābhilāṣañca nāṭyadharmī tu sā smṛtā // BhN_13.74 //

GK18bharnatu:4408: yā gamyā pramadā bhūtvā gamyā bhūmiṣu yujyate /

GK18bharnatu:4413: so 'ṅgābhinayasaṃyukto nāṭyadharmī tu sā smṛtā // BhN_13.80 //
GK18bharnatu:4415: divyamānuṣaratyarthaṃ nāṭyadharmī tu sā smṛtā // BhN_13.81 //
GK18bharnatu:4417: raṅgapīṭhagataḥ prokto nāṭyadharmī tu sā bhavet // BhN_13.82 //

GK18bharnatu:4424: ukto mayehābhinayo yathāvat śākhākṛto yaśca kṛto 'ṅgahāraiḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4426: iti bharatīye nāṭyaśāstre karayuktidharmīvyañjako nāma trayodaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GK18bharnatu:4428: yo vāgabhinayaḥ prokto mayā pūrvaṃ dvijottamāḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4430: vāci yatnastu kartavyo nāṭyasyeyaṃ tanuḥ smṛtā /
GK18bharnatu:4433: tasmādvācaḥ paraṃ nāsti vāg hi sarvasya kāraṇam // BhN_14.3 //
GK18bharnatu:4436: dvividhaṃ hi smṛtaṃ pāṭhyaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ prākṛtaṃ tathā /
GK18bharnatu:4441: vijñeyaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ pāṭhyaṃ prayogañca nibodhata // BhN_14.7 //
GK18bharnatu:4444: tatra svarāścaturdaśa - a ā i ī u ū ṛ ṝ ḷ ḹ e ai
GK18bharnatu:4446: kādīni vyañjanāni yathā - ka kha ga gha ṅa ca cha ja jha
GK18bharnatu:4447: ña ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa ta tha da dha na pa pha ba bha ma ya ra la va śa ṣa sa ha iti vyañjanavargaḥ
GK18bharnatu:4448: varge varge samākhyātau dvau varṇau prāgavasthitau /

GK18bharnatu:4451: jihvāmūlaśca dantāśca nāsikoṣṭhau ca tālu ca // BhN_14.10 //
GK18bharnatu:4463: ṅa ña ṇa na mā anunāsikāḥ |
GK18bharnatu:4466: dvau dvau varṇau tu vargādyau śaṣasāśca trayo 'pare /
GK18bharnatu:4470: gaghaṅa jajhaña ḍaḍhaṇa dadhana babhama tathaiva yaralavā matā ghoṣāḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4471: kakha cacha ṭaṭha tatha papha iti vargeṣvaghoṣāḥ syuḥ // BhN_14.13 //
GK18bharnatu:4474: paphababhamāstvoṣṭhyāḥ syuḥ dantyā ḷlasā ahau ca kaṇṭhasthau /
GK18bharnatu:4475: tālavyā icuyaśā syurṛṭuraṣā mūrdhasthitā jñeyāḥ // BhN_14.15 //
GK18bharnatu:4476: ḷḹ dantyau oau kaṇṭhoṣṭhyau eaikārau ca kaṇṭhatālavyau /

GK18bharnatu:4483: kacaṭatapā svaritāḥ syuḥ khachaṭhathaphā syuḥ sadā kramyāḥ // BhN_14.19 //
GK18bharnatu:4485: vedyo visarjanīyo jihvāsthāne sthito varṇaḥ // BhN_14.20 //
GK18bharnatu:4486: ete vyañjanavarṇāḥ samāsataḥ saṃjñayā mayā kathitāḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4488: yasmin sthāne sa samo vijñeyo yaḥ savarṇasaṃjño 'sau |
GK18bharnatu:4489: ya ime svarāścaturdaśa nirdiṣṭāstatra vai daśa samānāḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4490: pūrvo hrasvaḥ teṣāṃ paraśca dīrgho 'vagantavyaḥ // BhN_14.22 //
GK18bharnatu:4518: ekasya bahūnāṃ vā dhātorliṅgasya vā padānāṃ vā /
GK18bharnatu:4519: vibhajantyarthaṃ yasmāt vibhaktayastena tāḥ proktāḥ // BhN_14.36 //
GK18bharnatu:4520: viśiṣṭāstu svarā yatra vyañjanaṃ vāpi yogataḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4521: sandhīyate pade yasmāttasmāt sandhiḥ prakīrtitaḥ // BhN_14.37 //
GK18bharnatu:4523: sandhīyate ca yasmāttasmāt sandhiḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ // BhN_14.38 //
GK18bharnatu:4527: padabandhāḥ kartavyā nibaddhabandhāstu cūrṇā vā // BhN_14.40 //
GK18bharnatu:4528: vibhaktyantaṃ padaṃ jñeyaṃ nibaddhaṃ cūrṇameva ca /

GK18bharnatu:4544: supratiṣṭhā bhavet pañca gāyatrī ṣaḍ bhavediha /
GK18bharnatu:4553: vikṛtiḥ syāt trayoviṃśā caturviṃśā ca saṃkṛtiḥ // BhN_14.53 //
GK18bharnatu:4556: chandasāṃ tu tathā hyete bhedāḥ prastārayogataḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4559: prayogajāni sarvāṇi prāyaśo na bhavanti hi // BhN_14.56 //
GK18bharnatu:4563: śatāni pañca vṛtānāṃ bṛhatyāṃ dvādaśaiva ca // BhN_14.58 //
GK18bharnatu:4565: traiṣṭubhe dve sahasre ca catvāriṃśattathāṣṭa ca // BhN_14.59 //
GK18bharnatu:4568: aṣṭau sahasrāṇi śataṃ dvyadhikā navatiḥ punaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4571: vṛttāni caiva catvāri śakvaryāḥ parisaṃkhyayā // BhN_14.62 //
GK18bharnatu:4572: dvātriṃśacca sahasrāṇi sapta caiva śatāni ca /
GK18bharnatu:4575: ṣaṭtriṃśaccaiva vṛttāni hyaṣṭyāṃ nigaditāni ca // BhN_14.64 //
GK18bharnatu:4579: tajjñaiḥ śatasahasre dve śatamekaṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_14.66 //
GK18bharnatu:4581: catvāri caiva vṛttāni samasaṃkhyāśrayāṇi tu // BhN_14.67 //
GK18bharnatu:4585: kṛtau śatasahasrāṇi daśa proktāni saṃkhyayā // BhN_14.69 //
GK18bharnatu:4589: sapta vai gaditāstvatra navatiścaiva saṃkhyayā // BhN_14.71 //
GK18bharnatu:4596: aṣṭāśīti sahasrāṇi vṛttānāṃ ṣaṭ śatāni ca /
GK18bharnatu:4597: aṣṭau caiva tu vṛttāni vikṛtyāṃ gaditāni tu // BhN_14.75 //

GK18bharnatu:4621: laghupūrvo yakārastu nakāre tu laghutrayam // BhN_14.87 //
GK18bharnatu:4626: gurvekaṃ giti vijñeyaṃ tathā laghu liti smṛtam /

GK18bharnatu:4637: kṛtiśca dvyadhikā proktā prakṛtyāṃ sapta vai trikāḥ // BhN_14.95 //
GK18bharnatu:4639: aṣṭatrikāḥ saṃkṛtau syāt saikā cābhikṛtiḥ punaḥ // BhN_14.96 //

GK18bharnatu:4644: varṇaḥ svaro vidhirvṛttamiti chandogato vidhiḥ // BhN_14.98 //
GK18bharnatu:4645: naivātiriktaṃ hīnaṃ vā yatra saṃpadyate kramaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4647: yatrārthasya samāptiḥ syāt sa virāma iti smṛtaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4652: kruṣṭe madhyaṃ dinaṃ proktaṃ traiṣṭubhaṃ parikīrtyate // BhN_14.102 //
GK18bharnatu:4654: hrasvaṃ dīrghaṃ plutañcaiva trividhañcākṣaraṃ smṛtam // BhN_14.103 //
GK18bharnatu:4656: tāraścaiva hi mandraśca madhyamastrividhaḥ svaraḥ // BhN_14.104 //
GK18bharnatu:4659: chandato yasya pāde syāddhīnaṃ vā'dhikameva vā /
GK18bharnatu:4660: akṣaraṃ nicṛditi proktaṃ bhūrik ceti dvijottamāḥ // BhN_14.106 //
GK18bharnatu:4662: tacchando nāmato jñeyaṃ svarāḍiti virāḍapi // BhN_14.107 //
GK18bharnatu:4664: divyo divyetaraścaiva divyamānuṣa eva ca // BhN_14.108 //
GK18bharnatu:4666: triṣṭup ca jagatī caiva divyo 'yaṃ prathamo gaṇaḥ // BhN_14.109 //
GK18bharnatu:4674: dvikau glāviti varṇoktau miśrau cetyapi mātrikau // BhN_14.113 //
GK18bharnatu:4682: miśrau glāviti vijñeyau pṛthak lakṣyavibhāgataḥ // BhN_14.117 //
GK18bharnatu:4690: dviguṇāñca laghoḥ kṛtvā saṃkhyāṃ piṇḍena yojayet // BhN_14.121 //
GK18bharnatu:4692: kośaṃ tu sarvalaghvantyaṃ miśrarūpāṇi sarvataḥ // BhN_14.122 //

GK18bharnatu:4695: ekādikāṃ tathā saṃkhyāṃ chandaso viniveśya tu /
GK18bharnatu:4696: yāvat pūrṇantu pūrveṇa pūrayeduttaraṃ gaṇam // BhN_14.124 //
GK18bharnatu:4697: samānāṃ viṣamāṇāṃ ca saṃguṇayya tathā sphuṭam /
GK18bharnatu:4699: evaṃ kṛtvā tu sarveṣāṃ pareṣāṃ pūrvapūraṇam /
GK18bharnatu:4704: nyasellaghu yathā saikamakṣaraṃ guru cāpyatha // BhN_14.128 //
GK18bharnatu:4709: iti bharatīye nāṭyaśāstre vācikābhinaye chandovidhānaṃ nāma caturdaśo
GK18bharnatu:4713: vṛttāni teṣu nāṭye 'smin prayojyāni nibodhata // BhN_15.1 //
GK18bharnatu:4714: ādye punarantye dve dve guruṇī cet /
GK18bharnatu:4725: khyātarūpā vṛtte sā mālinī nāmnā // BhN_15.6 //
GK18bharnatu:4727: śeṣāṇi tu gurūṇi syurmālinī sā matā yathā // BhN_15.7 //
GK18bharnatu:4730: dvitīyaṃ pañcamaṃ caiva laghu yatra pratiṣṭhitam /
GK18bharnatu:4731: śeṣāṇi ca gurūṇi syurmālatī nāma sā yathā // BhN_15.9 //
GK18bharnatu:4734: dvitīyaṃ ca caturthaṃ ca pañcamaṃ ca yadā laghu /
GK18bharnatu:4735: yasyāḥ saptākṣare pāde jñeyā sā tūddhatā yathā // BhN_15.11 //
GK18bharnatu:4736: sau trikau yadi pāde hyantimaśca gakāraḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4740: ādau dve nidhane caiva guruṇī yatra vai sadā /
GK18bharnatu:4741: pāde saptākṣare jñeyā nāmnā bhramaramālikā // BhN_15.14 //
GK18bharnatu:4743: antye yadi gakāraḥ sā tu bhramaramālā // BhN_15.15 //
GK18bharnatu:4746: eṣā bhramati mattā kānte bhramaramālā // BhN_15.16 //
GK18bharnatu:4747: ādyaṃ tṛtīyamantyaṃ ca pañcamaṃ saptamaṃ tathā /
GK18bharnatu:4748: gurūṇyaṣṭākṣare pāde siṃhalekheti sā yathā // BhN_15.17 //
GK18bharnatu:4749: jātu yasya gau na , pāde saṃsthitaḥ samasvarūpe /
GK18bharnatu:4752: tanmano mama praviṣṭaṃ vṛttamadya siṃhalekham // BhN_15.19 //
GK18bharnatu:4753: caturthaṃ ca dvitīyaṃ ca ṣaṣṭhamaṣṭamameva ca /
GK18bharnatu:4755: yadā tu jātparau ralau gakāra eva ca sthitaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4759: asaṃsthitaiḥ padaiḥ priyā karoti mattaceṣṭitam // BhN_15.22 //
GK18bharnatu:4761: gurūṇi yasminsā nāmnā vidyunmāleti kīrtitā // BhN_15.23 //
GK18bharnatu:4762: mau gau cāntyau yasyāḥ pāde pādasyānte vicchedaśca /
GK18bharnatu:4766: pañcamaṃ saptamaṃ cāntyaṃ guru pāde 'ṣṭake tathā /
GK18bharnatu:4771: gurūṇi yasyāḥ sā nāmnā jñeyā madhukarī yathā // BhN_15.28 //
GK18bharnatu:4777: yasyā gurūṇi sā jñeyā paṅktirutpalamālikā // BhN_15.31 //
GK18bharnatu:4778: trīṇyādau yadi hi gurūṇi syuścatvāro yadi laghavo madhye /
GK18bharnatu:4782: śobhāṃ svāṃ na vahati tāṃ baddhā suśliṣṭā kuvalayamāleyam // BhN_15.33 //
GK18bharnatu:4783: dvitīyaṃ ca caturthaṃ ca ṣaṣṭamaṣṭamameva ca /
GK18bharnatu:4784: hrasvaṃ daśākṣare pāde yatra sā śikhisāriṇī // BhN_15.34 //
GK18bharnatu:4785: jau trikau hi pādagau tu yasya gau ca saṃśritau tathā samau stau /
GK18bharnatu:4789: garbhiṇīva dṛśyase hyanārye kiṃ mayūrasāriṇī tvamevam // BhN_15.36 //
GK18bharnatu:4790: ādyaṃ caturthamantyaṃ ca saptamaṃ daśamaṃ tathā /
GK18bharnatu:4791: gurūṇi traiṣṭubhe pāde yatra syurdodhakaṃ tu tat // BhN_15.37 //
GK18bharnatu:4792: bhau tu bhagāviti yasya gaṇāḥ syuḥ syācca yatistricaturbhirathā'smin /
GK18bharnatu:4793: traiṣṭubhameva hi tatkhalu nāmnā dodhakavṛttamiti pravadanti // BhN_15.38
GK18bharnatu:4796: paśya vilāsini kuñjarametaṃ dodhakavṛttamayaṃ prakaroti // BhN_15.39 //
GK18bharnatu:4797: ādau dvau pañcamaṃ caivāpyaṣṭamaṃ naidhanaṃ tathā /

GK18bharnatu:4800: śrutvā ghanagarjitamadritaṭe vṛkṣān pratimoṭayati dviradaḥ // BhN_15.41 //
GK18bharnatu:4801: navamaṃ saptamaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ tṛtīyaṃ ca bhavellaghu /
GK18bharnatu:4802: sarvāsvavasthāsu ca kāmatantre yogyāsi kiṃ vā bahunendravajrā // BhN_15.43
GK18bharnatu:4805: priye śriyā varṇaviśeṣaṇena smitena kāntyā sukumārabhāvaiḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4806: amī guṇā rūpaguṇānurūpā bhavanti te kiṃ tvamupendravajrā // BhN_15.45 //
GK18bharnatu:4807: ādyaṃ tṛtīyamantyaṃ ca saptamaṃ navamaṃ tathā /
GK18bharnatu:4808: gurūṇyekādaśe pāde yatra sā tu rathoddhatā // BhN_15.46 //
GK18bharnatu:4809: kiṃ tvayā subhaṭa dūravarjitaṃ nātmano na suhṛdāṃ priyaṃ kṛtam /
GK18bharnatu:4810: yatpalāyanaparāyaṇasya te yāti dhūliradhunā rathoddhatā // BhN_15.47 //
GK18bharnatu:4812: kiṃ tvayā kumatisaṅgayā sadā nājñayeva suhṛdāṃ priyaṃ kṛtam /
GK18bharnatu:4813: yad gṛhādvacanaroṣakampitā yāti tūrṇamabalā rathoddhatā // BhN_15.48 //
GK18bharnatu:4814: ādyaṃ tṛtīyamantyaṃ ca saptamaṃ daśamaṃ guru /

GK18bharnatu:4818: āgatāsi bhavanaṃ mama yasmātsvāgataṃ tava varoru niṣīda // BhN_15.50 //

GK18bharnatu:4821: duḥśīlaṃ vā nirguṇaṃ vāparaṃ vā loke dhairyādapriyaṃ na bravīṣi /

GK18bharnatu:4824: gurūṇi jāgate pāde yatra tattoṭakaṃ bhavet // BhN_15.53 //

GK18bharnatu:4831: tathopāntyaṃ jagatyāṃ ca guru cetkumudaprabhā // BhN_15.56 //
GK18bharnatu:4832: yau trikau tathā nyau yadi khalu pāde ṣaḍbhireva varṇairyadi ca yatiḥ syāt
GK18bharnatu:4833: nityasaṃniviṣṭā jagatividhāne nāmataḥ prasiddhā kumudanibhā sā //
GK18bharnatu:4836: nindyamadya kiṃ tvaṃ vigalitaśobhā candrapādayuktā kumudavatī ca //
GK18bharnatu:4838: yadi khalu pāde nyau trikau yathā yau yatirapi varṇaiḥ ṣaḍbhireva cetsyāt /
GK18bharnatu:4839: jagatividhāne nityasaṃniviṣṭā kumudanibhā sā nāmataḥ prasiddhā //
GK18bharnatu:4841: kumudanibhā tvaṃ kāmabāṇaviddhā kimasi natabhrūḥ śītavātadagdhā /
GK18bharnatu:4844: ādau pañcākṣaracchedaścandralekhā tu sā yathā // BhN_15.61 //
GK18bharnatu:4845: vaktraṃ saumyaṃ te padmapatrāyatākṣaṃ kāmasyāvāsaṃ sunāsoccaprahāsam /
GK18bharnatu:4846: kāmasyāpīdaṃ kāmamāhartukāmaṃ kānte kāntyā tvaṃ candralekheva bhāsi //
GK18bharnatu:4847: tṛtīyamantyaṃ navamaṃ pañcamaṃ ca yadā guru /
GK18bharnatu:4848: dvādaśākṣarake pāde yatra sā pramitākṣarā // BhN_15.63 //
GK18bharnatu:4851: api kasyacidyuvatirasti sukhā pramitākṣarā sa hi pumāñjayati // BhN_15.64
GK18bharnatu:4853: gurūṇi dvādaśe pāde vaṃśasthā jagatī tu sā // BhN_15.65 //
GK18bharnatu:4854: yadi trikau jtau bhavatastu pādatastathaiva ca jrāvavasānasaṃsthitau /
GK18bharnatu:4855: tadā hi vṛttaṃ jagatīpratiṣṭhitaṃ vadanti vaṃśasthamitīha nāmataḥ //
GK18bharnatu:4856: na me priyā tvaṃ bahumānavarjitāṃ priyaṃ priyā te paruṣābhibhāṣiṇī /
GK18bharnatu:4857: tathā ca paśyāmyahamadya vigrahaṃ dhruvaṃ hi vaṃśasthagatiṃ kariṣyati //
GK18bharnatu:4858: caturthamantyaṃ daśamaṃ saptamaṃ ca yadā guru /
GK18bharnatu:4859: bhaveddhi jāgate pāde tadā syāddhariṇaplutā // BhN_15.68 //
GK18bharnatu:4862: saptamaṃ navamaṃ cāntyamupāntyaṃ ca yadā guru /
GK18bharnatu:4863: dvādaśākṣarake pāde kāmadatteti sā yathā // BhN_15.70 //
GK18bharnatu:4864: karajapadavibhūṣitā yathā tvaṃ sudati daśanavikṣatādharā ca /
GK18bharnatu:4865: gatirapi caraṇāvalagnamandā tvamasi mṛganibhākṣi kāmadattā // BhN_15.71 //
GK18bharnatu:4866: ādyaṃ caturthaṃ daśamaṃ saptamaṃ ca yadā laghu /
GK18bharnatu:4867: pāde tu jāgate yasyā aprameyā tu sā yathā // BhN_15.72 //
GK18bharnatu:4868: na te kācidanyā samā dṛśyate strī nṛloke viśiṣṭā guṇairadvitīyaiḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4869: trilokyāṃ guṇajjñān samāhṛtya sarvān jagatyaprameyāsi sṛṣṭā vidhātrā //
GK18bharnatu:4871: pāde yatra laghūni syuḥ padminī nāma sā yathā // BhN_15.74 //
GK18bharnatu:4872: rāstrikāḥ sāgarākhyā niviṣṭā yadā syāt trike ca trike yuktarūpā yatiḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4873: sanniviṣṭā jagatyāstatassā budhair nāmataścāpi saṃkīrtyate padminī //
GK18bharnatu:4875: keśapāśacchadā cakravākastanī padminīva priye bhāsi me sarvadā //
GK18bharnatu:4877: pītatoyāvalī baddhakāñcīguṇā padminīva priye bhāsi nīre sthitā //
GK18bharnatu:4878: ādau ṣaṭ daśamaṃ caiva pāde yatra laghūnyatha /
GK18bharnatu:4879: śeṣāṇi tu gurūṇi syurjāgate puṭasaṃjñitā // BhN_15.78 //
GK18bharnatu:4880: yadi caraṇaniviṣṭau nau tathā myau yatividhirapi yuktyāṣṭābhiriṣṭaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4881: bhavati ca jagatīsthaḥ sarvadāsau ya iha hi puṭavṛttaṃ nāmatastu //
GK18bharnatu:4883: madanamadavilāsaiḥ kāminīnāṃ kathayati puṭavṛttaṃ puṣpamāsaḥ // BhN_15.80
GK18bharnatu:4885: vicchedo 'tijagatyāṃ tu caturbhiḥ sā prabhāvatī // BhN_15.81 //
GK18bharnatu:4886: kathaṃ nvidaṃ kamalaviśālalocane gṛhaṃ dhanaiḥ pihitakare divākare /
GK18bharnatu:4891: śobhāḍhyairharasi manāṃsi kāmukānāṃ suvyaktaṃ hyatijagatī praharṣiṇī ca //
GK18bharnatu:4892: ṣaṣṭhaṃ ca saptamaṃ caiva daśamaikādaśe laghu /
GK18bharnatu:4895: ete meghā garjitanādojjvalacihnāḥ prāvṛṭkālaṃ mattamayūrāḥ kathayanti //
GK18bharnatu:4896: ādau dve caturthaṃ caiva cāṣṭamaikādaśe guru /
GK18bharnatu:4897: antyopāntye ca śakvaryā vasantatilakā yathā // BhN_15.87 //
GK18bharnatu:4900: pañcādau śakvarī pāde gurūṇi trīṇi naidhane /
GK18bharnatu:4901: pañcākṣarādau ca yatirasaṃbādhā tu sā yathā // BhN_15.89 //
GK18bharnatu:4903: mānālokajñaḥ sutabalakulaśīlāḍhyo yasminsammānaṃ na sadṛśamanu paśyeddhi /
GK18bharnatu:4904: gacchettaṃ tyaktvā drutagatiraparaṃ deśaṃ kīrṇā nānārthairavaniriyamasaṃbādhā // BhN_15.90
GK18bharnatu:4906: antyopāntye ca śakvaryāḥ pāde tu śarabhā yathā // BhN_15.91 //
GK18bharnatu:4907: eṣā kāntā vrajati lalitā vepamānā gulmaiścchannaṃ vanamabhinavaiḥ saṃpraviddham /
GK18bharnatu:4908: hā hā kaṣṭaṃ kimidamiti no vedmi mūḍho vyaktaṃ kānte śarabhalalitāntvaṃ karoṣi // BhN_15.92
GK18bharnatu:4909: adau ṣaṭ daśamaṃ caiva laghu caiva trayodaśam /
GK18bharnatu:4910: yatrātiśakvare pāde jñeyā nāndīmukhī tu sā // BhN_15.93 //
GK18bharnatu:4912: na khalu tava kadācitkrodhatāmrāyatākṣaṃ bhrukuṭivalitabhaṅgaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ mayāsyam /
GK18bharnatu:4913: kimiha bahubhiruktairyā mamecchā hṛdisthā tvamasi madhuravākyā devi nāndīmukhīva // BhN_15.94
GK18bharnatu:4914: ādyaṃ caturthaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ ca naidhanaṃ ca yadā guru /
GK18bharnatu:4915: ṣoḍaśākṣarake pāde yatrebhalalitaṃ tu tat // BhN_15.95 //
GK18bharnatu:4916: bhrau yadi nāśca nityamiha viracitacaraṇaḥ gaśca tathā vai bhavati nidhanamupagataḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4917: syādapi cāṣṭimeva yadi satatamanugataṃ tatkhalu vṛttamagravṛṣabhagajavilasitam // BhN_15.96
GK18bharnatu:4921: antyopāntye ca dīrghāṇi lalitapravaraṃ hi tat // BhN_15.98 //
GK18bharnatu:4922: yadā ymau pādasthau bhavata iha cetstau tathā gau tathā ṣaḍbhiścānyairyatirapi ca varṇairyathā syāt /
GK18bharnatu:4923: tadapyaṣṭau nityaṃ samanugatamevoktamanyaiḥ prayogajñairvṛttaṃ pravaralalitaṃ nāmatastu // yathā:
GK18bharnatu:4924: nakhālīḍhaṃ gātraṃ daśanakhacitaṃ coṣṭhagaṇḍaṃ śiraḥ puṣponmiśraṃ pravilulitakeśālakāntam
GK18bharnatu:4925: gatiḥ khinnā ceyaṃ vadanamapi saṃbhrāntanetram aho ślāghyaṃ vṛttaṃ pravaralalitaṃ kāmaceṣṭam ādyātparāṇi pañcātha dvādaśaṃ satrayodaśam /
GK18bharnatu:4926: antyaṃ saptadaśe pāde śikhariṇyāṃ gurūṇi ca // BhN_15.101 //
GK18bharnatu:4927: caturbhistasyaiva pravaralalitasya trikagaṇair yadā lau gaścānte bhavati caraṇe 'tyaṣṭigadite
GK18bharnatu:4928: yadā ṣaḍbhiścchedo bhavati yadi mārgeṇa vihitas tadā vṛtteṣveṣā khalu śikhariṇī nāma gaditā yathā:
GK18bharnatu:4929: mahānadyā bhogaṃ pulinamiva bhāti te jaghanaṃ tathāsyaṃ netrāḍhyaṃ bhramarasahitaṃ paṅkajamiva
GK18bharnatu:4930: gatirmandā ceyaṃ sutanu tava ceṣṭā sulalitā stanābhyāṃ tābhyāṃ tvaṃ śikhariṇi supīnāsi vanite yatra pañca laghūnyādau trayodaśacaturdaśe /
GK18bharnatu:4932: yadi hi caraṇe nsau slau gaḥ kramādviniveśitār yadi khalu yatiḥ ṣaḍbhirvarṇairstathā daśabhiḥ punaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4933: yadi vihitaṃ syādatyaṣṭiḥ prayogasukhāśrayaṃ vṛṣabhalalitaṃ vṛttaṃ jñeyaṃ tathā hariṇīti vā yathā:
GK18bharnatu:4934: jaladhararavaṃ śrutvā śrutvā madocchrayadarpito vilikhitamahīśṛṅgākṣepairvṛṣaiḥ pratinardya ca /
GK18bharnatu:4935: svayuvativṛto goṣṭhādgoṣṭhaṃ prayāti ca nirbhayo vṛṣabhalalitaṃ citraṃ vṛttaṃ karoti ca śādvale catvāryādau ca daśamaṃ guru yatra trayodaśaṃ caturdaśaṃ tathāntye dve caikādaśamathāpi ca yadā saptadaśe pāde śeṣāṇi ca laghūnyatha /
GK18bharnatu:4936: bhavanti yasminsā jñeyā śrīdharī nāmato yathā // BhN_15.108 //
GK18bharnatu:4937: mo bhnau ca syuścaraṇaracitāstau gurū ca praviṣṭāśchedaḥ śiṣṭo yadi ca daśabhiḥ syāttathānyaiścaturbhiḥ
GK18bharnatu:4938: atyaṣṭau ca pratiniyamitā varṇataḥ spaṣṭarūpā sā vijñeyā dvijamunigaṇaiḥ śrīdharī nāmatastu snānaiścūrṇaiḥ sukhasurabhibhirgandhavāsaiśca dhūpaiḥ puṣpaiścānyaiḥ śirasi racitairvastrayogaiśca taistaiḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4939: nānāratnaiḥ kanakakhacitairaṅgasaṃbhogasaṃsthairvyaktaṃ kānte kamalanilayā śrīdharīvātibhāsi ādyaṃ caturthaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ ca daśamaṃ naidhanaṃ guru /
GK18bharnatu:4941: yathā eṣa gajo 'drimastakataṭe kalabhaparivṛtaḥ krīḍati vṛkṣagulmagahane
GK18bharnatu:4943: megharavaṃ niśamya muditaḥ pavanajavasamaḥ sundari vaṃśapatrapatitaṃ punarapi kurute // BhN_15.112
GK18bharnatu:4946: bhavanti yatra dīrghāṇi śeṣāṇi ca laghūnyatha /
GK18bharnatu:4947: vilambitagatiḥ sā tu vijñeyā nāmato yathā // BhN_15.114 //
GK18bharnatu:4948: yadā dviruditau hi pādamabhisaṃśritau jsau trikau tathaiva ca punastayornidhanamāśritau yau lagau /
GK18bharnatu:4949: tadaṣṭiratipūrvikā yatirapi svabhāvādyathā vilambitagatistadā nigaditā dvijairnāmataḥ // BhN_15.115
GK18bharnatu:4952: na me priyamidaṃ janasya bahumānarāgeṇa yanmadena vivaśā vilambitagatiḥ kṛtā tvaṃ priye // pañcādau pañcadaśakaṃ dvādaśaikādaśe guru /
GK18bharnatu:4953: caturdaśaṃ tathāntye dve citralekhā dhṛtau smṛtā // BhN_15.117 //
GK18bharnatu:4955: keśaiḥ snānāḍhyaiḥ kusumabharitairvastrarāgaiśca taistaiḥ kānte saṃkṣepāt kimiha bahunā citralekheva bhāsi // BhN_15.118 //
GK18bharnatu:4957: trayodaśaṃ dvādaśaṃ ca ṣaṣṭhamaṣṭamameva ca // BhN_15.119 //
GK18bharnatu:4959: pāde laghūni śeṣāṇi śārdūlakrīḍitaṃ tu tat // BhN_15.120 //
GK18bharnatu:4960: msau jsau tau guru ca prayoganiyatā yasminniviṣṭāstrikā ādyā cāntyayatiścatustrikayutā jñeyā parā saptabhiḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4961: nityaṃ yatpadamāśritā hyatidhṛtirnityaṃ kavīnāṃ priyaṃ tajjñeyaṃ khalu vṛttajātinipuṇaiḥ śārdūlavikrīḍitam yathā:
GK18bharnatu:4963: dhairyotsāhaparākramaprabhṛtibhistaistairvicitrairguṇair vṛttaṃ te ripughāti bhāti samare śārdūlavikrīḍitam // BhN_15.122 //
GK18bharnatu:4964: tāvattvaṃ vijitendriyaḥ śubhamate sarvātmanā pratyahaṃ dāne śīlavidhau ca yojaya manaḥ svargāpavargāpaham
GK18bharnatu:4965: yāvad vyādhijarāpracaṇḍanakharo vyāyatsaṭābhirbhṛśaṃ mṛtyuste na karoti jīvitamṛgaiḥ śārdūlavikrīḍitam catvāryādau ca ṣaṣṭhaṃ ca saptamaṃ sacaturdaśam /
GK18bharnatu:4966: tathā pañcadaśaṃ caiva ṣiḍaśaṃ naidhanaṃ tathā // BhN_15.124 //
GK18bharnatu:4967: etāni ca gurūṇi syuḥ śeṣāṇi tu laghūnyatha /
GK18bharnatu:4968: pāde yatra kṛtau jñeyā nāmnā suvadanā tu sā // BhN_15.125 //
GK18bharnatu:4969: mrau mnau ybhau lgau ca samyagyadi ca viracitāḥ pāde kramavaśād vicchedaḥ saptabhiḥ syātpunarapi ca yatiḥ saptākṣarakṛtā /
GK18bharnatu:4970: yadyeṣā saṃśritā syātkṛtimapi ca punaḥ śliṣṭākṣarapadā vidvadbhirvṛttajātau tata iha gaditā nāmnā suvadanā // BhN_15.126 //
GK18bharnatu:4972: netre līlālasānte kamaladalanibhe bhrūcāpavinate raktoṣṭhaṃ pīnamadhyaṃ samasahitaghanāḥ snigdhāśca daśanāḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4973: karṇāvaṃsapralambau cibukamapi nataṃ ghoṇā surucirā vyaktaṃ tvaṃ martyaloke varatanu vihitāsyekā suvadanā // BhN_15.127 //
GK18bharnatu:4974: catvāryādau tathā ṣaṣṭhaṃ saptamaṃ ca caturdaśam /
GK18bharnatu:4975: aṣṭādaśaṃ saptadaśaṃ tathā pañcadaśaṃ punaḥ // BhN_15.128 //
GK18bharnatu:4977: ekaviṃśatike pāde sragdharā nāma sā yathā // BhN_15.129 //
GK18bharnatu:4978: mrau mnau yau yaśca samyagyadi hi viracitāḥ syustrikāḥ pādayoge varṇaiḥ pūrvopadiṣṭairyatirapi ca punaḥ saptabhiḥ saptabhiḥ syāt /
GK18bharnatu:4979: vṛttaṃ samyagyadi syātprakṛtimanugataṃ tatvavidbhiḥ pradiṣṭaṃ vijñeyaṃ vṛttajātau kavijanadayitā sragdharā nāmatastu // BhN_15.130 //
GK18bharnatu:4981: cūtāśokāravindaiḥ kuravakatilakaiḥ karṇikāraiḥ śirīṣaiḥ punnāgaiḥ pārijātairvakulakuvalayaiḥ kiṃśukaiḥ sātimuktaiḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4982: etairnānāprakāraiḥ bahulasurabhibhirviprakīrṇaiśca taistair vāsantaiḥ puṣpavṛndairnaravara vasudhā sragdharevādya bhāti // BhN_15.131 //
GK18bharnatu:4983: caturthamādyaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ ca daśamaṃ dvādaśaṃ tathā /
GK18bharnatu:4984: ṣoḍaśāṣṭādaśe caiva naidhanaṃ ca gurūṇyatha // BhN_15.132 //
GK18bharnatu:4986: bhavanti yatra tajjñeyaṃ bhadrakaṃ nāmato yathā // BhN_15.133 //
GK18bharnatu:4987: bhrau caraṇe yadā viniyatau trikau kramavaśādathātikṛtividhau nrau ca tataḥ paraṃ ca rucirāvanantarakṛtau nagāvapi punaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:4988: tacca daśāṣṭavarṇaracitā caturṣvapi tathā yatiśca satataṃ bhadrakavṛttameva khalu nāṭyayogakuśalairbudhairnigaditam utplutamekahastacaraṇaṃ dvitīyakararecitaṃ vaṃśamṛdaṅgavādyamadhuraṃ vicitrakaraṇānugaṃ bahuvidham
GK18bharnatu:4989: bhadrakametadadya subhage vidagdhagaticeṣṭitaiḥ sulalitair nṛtyasi vibhramākulapadaṃ viviktarasabhāvitaṃ śaśimukhi // BhN_15.135 //
GK18bharnatu:4991: ekādaśaṃ saptadaśaṃ pañcamaṃ ca gurūṇyatha // BhN_15.136 //
GK18bharnatu:4993: vṛttaṃ tadaśvalalitaṃ vijñeyaṃ nāmato yathā // BhN_15.137 //
GK18bharnatu:4994: yadi ca nakāra ādiracitaḥ pade viracito 'nta eva lagau yadi ca nabhau tridhā ca nihitau krameṇa khalu madhyāvapi tathā /
GK18bharnatu:4995: yadi ca samāśritaṃ hi vikṛtiṃ yatiśca daśabhistathaikasahitais tata iha kīrtitaṃ munigaṇairviśuddhacaritaistadaśvalalitam vividhaturaṅganāgarathayodhasaṅkulamalaṃ balaṃ samuditaṃ śaraśataśaktikuntaparidhāsiyaṣṭivitataṃ bahupraharaṇam /
GK18bharnatu:4996: ripuśatamuktaśastraravabhītaśaṅkitabhaṭaṃ bhayākuladiśaṃ kṛtamabhivīkṣya saṃyugamukhe samarpitaguṇaṃ tvayāśvalalitam // BhN_15.139 //
GK18bharnatu:4998: viṃśaṃ saptadaśaṃ caiva trayoviṃśaṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_15.140 //
GK18bharnatu:4999: etāni ca laghūni syuḥ śeṣāṇyatha gurūṇi ca /
GK18bharnatu:5000: caturviṃśatike pāde meghamāleti sā yathā // BhN_15.141 //
GK18bharnatu:5001: yadi khalu caraṇasthitau nau trikau kṛtikāravyāstathā rāḥ syuḥ kramāt /
GK18bharnatu:5002: bhavati yadi yatistathā saptabhiḥ saptabhistriṣvato 'nyā yatiḥ pañca vidyāttathā // BhN_15.142
GK18bharnatu:5004: surapatidhanurujjvalābaddhakakṣyā taḍiddyotasannāhapaṭṭījvalā gaganatalavisāriṇī prāvṛṣaṇyā dṛḍhaṃ meghamālādhikaṃ śobhate // BhN_15.143
GK18bharnatu:5005: ādyaṃ caiva caturthaṃ ca pañcamaṃ ṣaṣṭhameva ca /
GK18bharnatu:5006: navamaṃ daśamaṃ caiva naidhanaṃ ca bhavedguru // BhN_15.144 //
GK18bharnatu:5008: vṛttajjñaiḥ sā tu vijñeyā krauñcapādīti nāmataḥ // BhN_15.145 //
GK18bharnatu:5009: bhmau yadi pāde sbhāvapi ceṣṭāvabhikṛtirapi ca hi yadi khalu vihitā nāśca samudrāḥ syurviniviṣṭā yadi ca khalu guru bhavati nidhanagatam /
GK18bharnatu:5010: pañcabhirādau chedamupetā punarapi yatiriha yadi khalu daśabhiḥ krauñcapadeyaṃ vṛttavidhāne suragaṇapitṛgaṇamunigaṇavihitā // BhN_15.146
GK18bharnatu:5011: yaḥ kila dākṣaṃ vidrutasomaṃ kratuvaramacamasamapagatakalaśaṃ pātitayūpaṃ kṣiptacaṣālaṃ vicayanamasamidhamapaśukacarukam
GK18bharnatu:5012: kārmukamuktenāśu cakāra vyapagatasuragaṇapitṛgaṇamiṣuṇā nityamasau te daityagaṇāriḥ pradahatu makhamiva ripugaṇamakhilam // BhN_15.147 //
GK18bharnatu:5013: yā kapilākṣī piṅgalakeśī kaliruciranudinamanunayakaṭhinā dīrghatarābhiḥ sthūlasirābhiḥ parivṛtavapuratiśayakuṭilagatiḥ
GK18bharnatu:5014: āyatajaṅghā nimnakapolā laghutarakucayugaparigatahṛdayā sā parihāryā krauñcapadā strī dhruvamiha niravadhisukhamabhilaṣatā // BhN_15.148 //
GK18bharnatu:5016: ekaviṃśaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ caturviṃśaṃ sanaidhanam // BhN_15.149 //
GK18bharnatu:5017: etāni guru saṃkhyāni śeṣāṇi ca laghūnyatha /
GK18bharnatu:5019: yasyāṃ mau to nāḥ strau nityaṃ praticaraṇamatha gaditakāstrikā hyanupūrvaśaḥ ṣaḍviṃśatyāmekonāyāṃ ca yadi hi khalu yatirabhidhā caturbhirathāṣṭābhiḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5020: paścādantyau lgau saṃyojyau yadi bhavati manujadayitāṃ samāśritamutkṛtiṃ nāmnā vṛttaṃ loke khyātaṃ kavivadana vikasanaparaṃ bhujaṅgavijṛmbhitam // BhN_15.151 //
GK18bharnatu:5022: rūpopetāṃ devaiḥ sṛṣṭāṃ samadagaja vilasitagatiṃ nirīkṣya tilottamāṃ prādakṣiṇyātprāptāṃ draṣṭuṃ bahuvadana macalanayanaṃ śiraḥ kṛtavān hariḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5023: dīrghaṃ niśvasyāntargūḍhaṃ stanavadana jaghanarucirāṃ nirīkṣya tathā punaḥ pṛṣṭhe nyastaṃ devendreṇa pravaramaṇi kanakavalayaṃ bhujaṅgavijṛmbhitam // BhN_15.152 //
GK18bharnatu:5025: meghamālādikaṃ tatsyānnau cādau kāguhā trikāḥ // BhN_15.153 //
GK18bharnatu:5027: muditajanapadākulā sphītasasyākarā bhūtadhātrī bhavantaṃ samabhyarcati dviradakaraviluptahintālatālīvanāstvāṃ namasyanti vindhyādayaḥ parvatāḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5028: sphuṭitakalaśāśuktinigīrṇamuktā phalairūrmihastairnamasyanti vaḥ sāgarāḥ muditajalacarākulāḥ saṃprakīrṇamalāḥ kīrtayantīva kīrtiṃ mahānimnagāḥ //
GK18bharnatu:5032: grathitāḥ pādayogena tad vṛttaṃ viṣamaṃ smṛtam // BhN_15.156 //
GK18bharnatu:5033: dvau samaṃ dvau ca viṣamau vṛtte 'rdhaviṣame tathā /
GK18bharnatu:5037: pāde siddhe samaṃ siddhaṃ viṣamaṃ sārvapādikam /
GK18bharnatu:5042: dvitīye caraṇe ca syādityanuṣṭup samāsataḥ // BhN_15.161 //
GK18bharnatu:5043: sau gau tu prathame pāde srau lgau cāpi dvitīyake /
GK18bharnatu:5044: yugme 'rdhaviṣame pāde jñeyā pathyā tu sā trikaiḥ // BhN_15.162 //
GK18bharnatu:5046: priyadānaratā pathyā dayite tvaṃ priyāsi me // BhN_15.163 //
GK18bharnatu:5047: mrau gau tu prathame pāde ysau lgau ca dvitīyake /
GK18bharnatu:5048: pāde bhau lgau tṛtīye ca caturthe tu tasau lagau // BhN_15.164 //
GK18bharnatu:5049: naivācāro na te mitraṃ na saṃbandhiguṇapriyā /
GK18bharnatu:5050: sarvathā sarvaviṣamā pathyā na bhavasi priye // BhN_15.165 //
GK18bharnatu:5052: pathyā hi viparītā sā vijñeyā nāmato yathā // BhN_15.166 //
GK18bharnatu:5053: kṛtena ramaṇasya kiṃ sakhi roṣeṇa te 'pyartham /
GK18bharnatu:5054: viparītā na pathyāsi tvaṃ jaḍe kena mohitā // BhN_15.167 //
GK18bharnatu:5056: anuṣṭupcapalā sā tu vijñeyā nāmato yathā // BhN_15.168 //
GK18bharnatu:5057: na khalvasyāḥ priyatamaḥ śrotavyaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ sakhyā /
GK18bharnatu:5058: nāradasya pratikṛtiḥ kathyate capalā hīyam // BhN_15.169 //
GK18bharnatu:5059: vipulā tu yuji jñeyā laghutvātsaptamasya tu /
GK18bharnatu:5080: kva yāsyasi varoru suratakāle viṣamā kiṃ vānavāsikā tvam // BhN_15.180 //
GK18bharnatu:5081: sjau sgau ca prathame pāde tathā caiva tṛtīyake /
GK18bharnatu:5082: ketumatyāṃ gaṇāḥ proktāḥ bhrau ngau gaśca sadā budhaiḥ // BhN_15.181 //
GK18bharnatu:5084: kimidaṃ ruṣāpahṛtaśobhaṃ ketumatīsamaṃ vada mukhaṃ te // BhN_15.182 //
GK18bharnatu:5085: vaktrasyāparapūrvasya cādau nau ro lagau trikāḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5086: najau rajau dvitīye ca śeṣāgraṃ punareva tu // BhN_15.183 //
GK18bharnatu:5087: prathame ca tṛtīye nau ralau gaśca prakīrtitaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5088: gaṇāścāparavaktre tu najau jrau dvicaturthayoḥ // BhN_15.184 //
GK18bharnatu:5090: kimidamaparavaktrameva te śaśivadane 'dya mukhaṃ parāṅmukham // BhN_15.185
GK18bharnatu:5091: nau yau tu prathame pāde njau jrau gaśca tathāpare /
GK18bharnatu:5092: yatra tatpuṣpitāgrā syādyadi śeṣaṃ tu pūrvavat // BhN_15.186 //
GK18bharnatu:5095: sjau slau cādau yathā nsau jgau bhnau jlau gaśca tathā punaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5096: sjau sjau gaśca trikā hyete udgatāyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // BhN_15.188 //
GK18bharnatu:5099: sjau slau ca tato nsau jgau nau sau ceti tṛtīyake /
GK18bharnatu:5100: sjau sjau gaśca caturthe tu lalitāyā gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // BhN_15.190 //
GK18bharnatu:5106: na ca tāni prayojyāni na śobhāṃ janayanti hi // BhN_15.193 //
GK18bharnatu:5108: dhruvāyoge tu vakṣyāmi teṣāṃ caiva vikalpanam // BhN_15.194 //
GK18bharnatu:5110: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi hyāryāṇāmapi lakṣaṇam // BhN_15.195 //
GK18bharnatu:5111: pathyā ca vipulā caiva caṣalā mukhato 'parā /
GK18bharnatu:5112: jaghane capalā caiva āryāḥ pañca prakīrtitāḥ // BhN_15.196 //
GK18bharnatu:5116: dvitīyāntyau yujau pādāvayujau tvaparau smṛtau // BhN_15.198 //
GK18bharnatu:5120: paścādardhe tu ṣaṣṭhaḥ syādekamātrastu kevalaḥ // BhN_15.200 //
GK18bharnatu:5121: dvivikalpastu ṣaṣṭho yo gurumadhyo bhavettu saḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5124: prathamādirathāntye ca pañcame vā vidhīyate // BhN_15.202 //
GK18bharnatu:5125: gaṇeṣu triṣu pādasya yasyāḥ pathyā tu sā bhavet /
GK18bharnatu:5126: ataśca vipulānyā tu vijñeyā yatilakṣaṇā // BhN_15.203 //
GK18bharnatu:5128: yasyāḥ syuḥ pādayoge tu vijñeyā capalā hi sā // BhN_15.204 //
GK18bharnatu:5137: paścādvā yo gaṇaḥ ṣaṣṭha ekamātraḥ sa ucyate /
GK18bharnatu:5138: dvivikalpastu yaḥ ṣaṣṭho gurumadhyo bhavettu saḥ // BhN_15.209 //
GK18bharnatu:5140: sā dvitīyā dvilaghukā saptame prathame yatiḥ // BhN_15.210 //
GK18bharnatu:5142: ayuggaṇo vidhātavyaḥ yuggaṇastu sa eva ca // BhN_15.211 //
GK18bharnatu:5143: prathamatṛtīyau pādau dvādaśamātrau bhavettu sā pathyā /
GK18bharnatu:5147: kasya tu pṛthumṛdujaghanā tanubāhvaṃ sodarī pathyā // BhN_15.213 //
GK18bharnatu:5155: pūrvārdhe lakṣaṇaṃ hyetadasyāḥ sa ca mukhena tu /
GK18bharnatu:5156: paścimārdhe tu capalā yasyāḥ sā jaghanena tu // BhN_15.217 //
GK18bharnatu:5158: āryāmukhe tu capalā tathāpi cāryā na me yataḥ sā kim /
GK18bharnatu:5159: dakṣā gṛhakṛtyeṣu tathā duḥkhe bhavati duḥkhārtā // BhN_15.218 //
GK18bharnatu:5164: vṛttajñaiḥ sā tu vijñeyā sarvataścapalā sakhi // BhN_15.220 //
GK18bharnatu:5166: aṣṭādaśa dvitīyaṃ ca tathā pañcadaśottamā // BhN_15.221 //
GK18bharnatu:5172: śeṣāṇi gurusaṃkhyāni hyevaṃ sarvatra nirdiśet // BhN_15.224 //

GK18bharnatu:9010: nidhane ca mano mā bhūd yuṣmākamiti sāntvitāḥ // BhN_36.48 //
GK18bharnatu:9016: nāṭyaṃ dattvā tataḥ sarve prāyaścittaṃ cariṣyatha // BhN_36.51 //
GK18bharnatu:9017: iti bharatīye nāṭyaśāstre nāṭyaśāpo nāma ṣaṭtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GK18bharnatu:9022: gāndharvaṃ caia nāṭyaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā cintāmupāgamat // BhN_37.2 //
GK18bharnatu:9023: sa cintayitvā manasā kathameṣa gṛhe mama /
GK18bharnatu:9024: nāṭyaprayogo hi bhavediti sādara eva san // BhN_37.3 //
GK18bharnatu:9026: apsarobhiridaṃ sārdhaṃ nāṭyaṃ bhavatu me gṛhe // BhN_37.4 //
GK18bharnatu:9028: divyāṅganānāṃ naiveha mānuṣaiḥ saha saṅgatiḥ // BhN_37.5 //
GK18bharnatu:9029: hitaṃ pathyaṃ ca vaktavyo bhavān svargādhipo hi yat /
GK18bharnatu:9030: ācāryāstatra gacchantu gatvā kurvantu te priyam // BhN_37.6 //
GK18bharnatu:9031: proktavāṃstu tato māṃ tu nṛpatiḥ sa kṛtāñjaliḥ /
GK18bharnatu:9040: tithiyajñakriyāsvetad yathā syān maṅgalaiḥ śubhaiḥ // BhN_37.11 //
GK18bharnatu:9044: sutāścāhūya samproktā sāmapūrvaṃ suraiḥ saha // BhN_37.13 //
GK18bharnatu:9045: ayaṃ hi nahuṣo rājā yācate naḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ /
GK18bharnatu:9046: gamyatāṃ sahitairbhūmiṃ prayoktuṃ nāṭyameva ca // BhN_37.14 //
GK18bharnatu:9048: brāhmaṇānāṃ nṛpāṇāṃ ca bhaviṣyatha na kutsitāḥ // BhN_37.15 //
GK18bharnatu:9050: na śakyaṃ cānyathā kartuṃ vacanaṃ pārthivasya hi // BhN_37.16 //
GK18bharnatu:9052: ātmopadeśasiddhaṃ hi nāṭyaṃ proktaṃ svayaṃbhuvā // BhN_37.17 //
GK18bharnatu:9054: prayogaḥ kārikāścaiva niruktāni tathaiva ca // BhN_37.18 //
GK18bharnatu:9056: adhiṣṭhitaṃ mayā svarge svātinā nāradena ca // BhN_37.19 //
GK18bharnatu:9057: tataśca vasudhāṃ gatvā nahuṣasya gṛhe dvijāḥ /
GK18bharnatu:9058: strīṇāṃ prayogaṃ bahudhā baddhavanto yathākramam // BhN_37.20 //
GK18bharnatu:9061: putrānutpādya vadhvā ca prayogaṃ ca yathākramam /
GK18bharnatu:9062: brahmaṇā samanujñātāḥ prāptāḥ svargaṃ punaḥ sutāḥ // BhN_37.22 //
GK18bharnatu:9064: bharatānāṃ ca vaṃśo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca pravartitaḥ // BhN_37.23 //
GK18bharnatu:9069: maṅgalyaṃ lalitaṃ caiva brahmaṇo vadanodbhavam // BhN_37.25 //
GK18bharnatu:9070: ya idaṃ śruṇuyān nityaṃ proktaṃ cedaṃ svayambhuvā /
GK18bharnatu:9073: yā gatirdānaśīlānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ prāpnuyāddhi saḥ // BhN_37.27 //
GK18bharnatu:9074: dānadharmeṣu sarveṣu kīrtyate tu mahat phalam /
GK18bharnatu:9078: gāndharvaṃ ceha nāṭyaṃ ca yaḥ samyak paripālayet /
GK18bharnatu:9079: sa īśvaragaṇeśānāṃ labhate sadgatiṃ parām // BhN_37.30 //
GK18bharnatu:9083: kiṃ cānyat samprapūrṇā bhavatu vasumatī naṣṭadurbhikṣarogā /
GK18bharnatu:9084: śāntirgobrāhmaṇānāṃ bhavatu narapatiḥ pātu pṛthvīṃ samagrām // BhN_37.31
GK18bharnatu:9085: iti bharatīye nāṭyaśāstre guhyatattvakathanādhyāyaḥ saptatriṃśaḥ nāṭyaśāstram saṃpūrṇam
